webp

Class WebpChunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • webp.WebpChunk

  • public class WebpChunk
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an individual chunk in a WebP file.

    Each chunk contains raw byte data, a type identifier, called FourCC and its size. This class also provides rudimentary utility methods to support this class.

    Refer to the WebP specification for information on Google Developer site

    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

      • WebpChunk

        public WebpChunk(int type,
                 int length,
                 byte[] data)
        Constructs a new WebpChunk instance to represent a single chunk.
        Parameters:
        type - the 32-bit FourCC chunk identifier (in little-endian integer form)
        length - the length of the chunk's payload
        data - raw chunk data
